channel.title: Batch file help
channel.description: I'm trying to make a cool batch file for my server. Right now it's basic. But for some reason these mix: [code]:backcolor cls echo Pick a background color: echo. echo Red echo Cyan echo Green echo Yellow echo White echo Purple echo. set /p c=Which color? if %c%==Green color a0 if %c%==Cyan color b0 if %c%==Red color c0 if %c%==Purple color d0 if %c%==Yellow color e0 if %c%==White color f0 goto menu :colors cls echo Pick a text color: echo. echo Red echo Blue echo Green echo Dark_Blue echo Normal echo Purple echo. set /p c=Which color? if %c%==Red color 04 if %c%==Blue color 03 if %c%==Green color 02 if %c%==Dark_Blue color 01 if %c%==Purple color 05 if %c%==Normal color 07 goto Menu[/code] When I change the text colors, the background changes. Wtf?

item.title: Batch file help
item.dc:creator: @Avn Avn/
item.description:
@Avn wrote:

That’s because your options for background and text is both c. You need to change the text option to another letter.

cls
echo Pick a background color:
echo.
echo Red
echo Cyan
echo Green
echo Yellow
echo White
echo Purple
echo.
set /p c=Which color?
if %c%==Green color a0
if %c%==Cyan color b0
if %c%==Red color c0
if %c%==Purple color d0
if %c%==Yellow color e0
if %c%==White color f0
goto menu
:colors
cls
echo Pick a text color:
echo.
echo Red
echo Blue
echo Green
echo Dark_Blue
echo Normal
echo Purple
echo.
set /p b=Which color?
if %b%==Red color 04
if %b%==Blue color 03
if %b%==Green color 02
if %b%==Dark_Blue color 01
if %b%==Purple color 05
if %b%==Normal color 07
goto Menu[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Batch file help
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

I’m trying to make a cool batch file for my server. Right now it’s basic. But for some reason these mix:

cls
echo Pick a background color:
echo.
echo Red
echo Cyan
echo Green
echo Yellow
echo White
echo Purple
echo.
set /p c=Which color?
if %c%==Green color a0
if %c%==Cyan color b0
if %c%==Red color c0
if %c%==Purple color d0
if %c%==Yellow color e0
if %c%==White color f0
goto menu
:colors
cls
echo Pick a text color:
echo.
echo Red
echo Blue
echo Green
echo Dark_Blue
echo Normal
echo Purple
echo.
set /p c=Which color?
if %c%==Red color 04
if %c%==Blue color 03
if %c%==Green color 02
if %c%==Dark_Blue color 01
if %c%==Purple color 05
if %c%==Normal color 07
goto Menu[/code]
When I change the text colors, the background changes. Wtf?

Read full topic
